mapper.select: SELECT id, rnd_start_blk, rnd_end_blk, rnd_start_time, rnd_end_time, cycle FROM tbl_node_overview_history LIMIT 10;

SELECT id, rnd_start_blk, rnd_end_blk, rnd_start_time, rnd_end_time, cycle FROM tbl_node_overview_history WHERE rnd_start_time < #{time} AND (rnd_end_time > #{time} OR rnd_end_time IS NULL) OR rnd_start_time > #{time} ORDER BY cycle ASC;
SELECT id, rnd_start_blk, rnd_end_blk, rnd_start_time, rnd_end_time, cycle FROM tbl_node_overview_history WHERE cycle > #{cycle} ORDER BY cycle ASC
SELECT id, rnd_start_blk, rnd_end_blk, rnd_start_time, rnd_end_time, cycle FROM tbl_node_overview_history where cycle = #{cycle}
